platforms.name: TikTok
platforms.demographics: 50.3% female, 49.3% male; 18-24 age group makes up 50.3% of audience
platforms.notes: Dominant platform for Gen Z Malaysian beauty content. Short, snappy skincare routine videos garner millions of views. Glass Skin Challenge and K-Beauty Routine Challenge drive massive engagement. PONGO data shows $3 return for every $1 spent on TikTok livestream campaigns for K-beauty brands.

platforms.name: Instagram
platforms.user_base: 15.5M users (43.2% of population); 65%+ in urban centers
platforms.notes: Best platform for before/after transformation content. Followers engage more with before/after transformation stories (PONGO data). Laneige campaign achieved 30% follower increase and 25% sales lift. Language: primarily English with some Malay.

platforms.name: YouTube
platforms.user_base: 25.1M users (70.2% of population) -- #1 platform by reach
platforms.demographics: 48.6% female, 51.4% male; broadest age range across all demographics
platforms.notes: Largest reach platform in Malaysia. Best for comprehensive clinic review content and long-form guides. Google SEO integration means content surfaces in search results. Soo Beauty (PJ-based) covers K-beauty routines. Language: English and Malay.

platforms.name: Facebook
platforms.demographics: 44.2% female, 55.8% male; strongest with 30-50 age range
platforms.notes: Still very dominant in Malaysia (84%+ of internet users). Facebook Groups are critical for community discussions and recommendations. Malay-language content achieves lower costs and higher engagement. Best platform for word-of-mouth and community-driven discovery. 30-50 age demographic is harder to reach elsewhere.

platforms.name: Xiaohongshu (RED / Little Red Book)
platforms.user_base: 2.5M+ Malaysian users (second-largest market outside mainland China/Taiwan); 300M+ global MAU
platforms.demographics: Primarily Chinese Malaysian women aged 18-35; represents more than 1/3 of Malaysia's ethnic Chinese population
platforms.notes: Critical platform for reaching high-spending Chinese Malaysian demographic. Climate-appropriate product reviews with before-after photos dominate. Korean dermatology clinics actively market on Xiaohongshu with KOL collaborations. Content in Mandarin but visual-first approach transcends language barriers. WARNING: many clinic recommendations may be paid promotions.

platforms.name: Google (Search + Maps + Reviews)
platforms.notes: Primary research tool during consideration stage. Google Reviews/Maps is top platform for verifying specific clinics. SEO strategy must cover English, Malay, and Chinese queries. High-intent search traffic converts well.

platforms.name: UNNI (Gangnam Unni)
platforms.demographics: Women 20-40 interested in Korean aesthetic treatments
platforms.notes: Korea's largest plastic surgery/aesthetics platform. Launched UNNI global version with English auto-translate. UnniGuide function provides accommodation, transport, interpretation. Guarantees no tourist markups. Critical for Malaysians researching specific Korean clinics.

platforms.name: X (Twitter)
platforms.notes: Declining user base in Malaysia. Mainly English-language content. Less visual than Instagram/TikTok, limiting beauty content effectiveness. Lower priority for Korean derm content strategy.

platforms.name: Lowyat.net Forums
platforms.demographics: Predominantly male, tech-oriented; some beauty/lifestyle threads
platforms.notes: Active dermatologist recommendation threads exist but focused on local Malaysian clinics, not Korean clinics. Good SEO value for long-tail searches. English-language content. Limited Korean derm-specific content currently -- represents an untapped opportunity.

platforms.name: Erufu Care
platforms.user_base: 3,000+ verified reviews for KL clinics alone
platforms.notes: Malaysia's dedicated aesthetic clinic review platform. All clinics verified by Ministry of Health. Currently focused on local Malaysian clinics, not Korean medical tourism. Rated 4.8/5 from 3000+ reviews.

additional_platforms.name: Creatrip
additional_platforms.notes: Korea travel platform with clinic booking. 830% increase in dermatology reservation rates. Available in English, Japanese, Chinese. Exclusive foreigner pricing. Official Seoul Medical Tourism partner.

additional_platforms.name: Kosmedi
additional_platforms.notes: Global healthcare platform for international patients in Korea. Real-time access to clinic listings, reviews, pricing. Multilingual coordinators via WhatsApp and KakaoTalk.

additional_platforms.name: Jivaka Beauty
additional_platforms.notes: English-language medical tourism platform. Strict clinic vetting criteria. Dedicated coordinators for end-to-end support.

additional_platforms.name: BeautyHopper
additional_platforms.notes: Korean Ministry of Health and Welfare accredited. All-women team. Covers primary medication costs. WhatsApp contact available for Malaysian patients.

additional_platforms.name: TripAdvisor
additional_platforms.notes: Some Korean clinics listed (Individuel Geneve, Laurel Clinic). Reviews from international visitors. Not a primary platform for clinic discovery but used for validation.

additional_platforms.name: L'Officiel Malaysia
additional_platforms.notes: Fashion/lifestyle magazine covering viral K-beauty products. Features curated TikTok viral product lists.

additional_platforms.name: Says.com
additional_platforms.notes: Malaysian news/lifestyle platform. Covers skincare product recommendations and beauty clinic news. Some Korean beauty content appears sporadically.

additional_platforms.name: Malaysian Beauty Blogs
additional_platforms.notes: Local beauty bloggers provide meticulous reviews and honest assessments of K-beauty products. Important for consideration stage but limited Korean clinic-specific content.

additional_platforms.name: WhatsApp
additional_platforms.user_base: 90.7% of Malaysians aged 16-64 use monthly -- most used messaging app
additional_platforms.notes: Critical booking and communication channel. Korean medical tourism agencies offer WhatsApp contact. Friend-to-friend recommendation sharing happens here. Not indexable or searchable but drives conversion.
